szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.actors

Interface ActorBasic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.actors.AbstractActor, szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.actors.AbstractMoveableActor, PipeHead, PipeSegment

    public interface ActorBasic
    The interface implemented by all game actors. This is a safe subset of actor functionality to be exposed to the player.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rectangle getActorRectangle()
      Returns a Rectangle object which contains actor properties related to position.
      TunnelCellBasic getCurrentPosition()
      Gets the tunnel cell where the actor is currently located.
      Direction getDirection()
      Gets the current orientation of the actor relative to the screen (facing left, right, up, down).
      ActorType getType()
      Gets the general category of the actor.
      int getX()
      Gets the horizontal coordinate of the actor.
      int getY()
      Gets the vertical coordinate of the actor.
      boolean intersects(ActorBasic other)
      Returns true if this actor intersects the actor passed as parameter to this method.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        int getX()
        Gets the horizontal coordinate of the actor.
        Returns:
        the horizontal coordinate of the actor.

      • getY

        int getY()
        Gets the vertical coordinate of the actor.
        Returns:
        the vertical coordinate of the actor.

      • getCurrentPosition

        TunnelCellBasic getCurrentPosition()
        Gets the tunnel cell where the actor is currently located.
        Returns:
        the tunnel cell where the actor is currently located.

      • getActorRectangle

        Rectangle getActorRectangle()
        Returns a Rectangle object which contains actor properties related to position.
        Returns:
        the actor's rectangle object.

      • getType

        ActorType getType()
        Gets the general category of the actor. Note: this is not the actual class of an actor, just an enum constant grouping possibly multiple actor classes according to their role within the game (different Enemies, different calibers of Bullets etc.).
        Returns:
        The ActorType of the actor.

      • getDirection

        Direction getDirection()
        Gets the current orientation of the actor relative to the screen (facing left, right, up, down). Possibly could be better named getOrientation().
        Returns:
        the Direction that the actor is facing in.

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(ActorBasic other)
        Returns true if this actor intersects the actor passed as parameter to this method. Most commonly this means whether their current position, or TunnelCell objects are equal, though if not, it checks if their rectangles touch or overlap at any point).
        Parameters:
        other - The actor to check if it intersects this actor.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the given actor is not null and intersects this actor | false otherwise.
